/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
